config.name: posix
config.command: clCheck 30 make NO_OCL_COMPILATION=1 KGCOMPILER=sthormkg -f struct.mk clean build

config.name: posix
config.command: clCheck 30 make NO_OCL_COMPILATION=1 KGCOMPILER=sthormkg -f enum.mk clean build

config.name: posix
config.command: clCheck 30 make NO_OCL_COMPILATION=1 KGCOMPILER=sthormkg -f typedef.mk clean build
